traits.Unarmored Defense: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.Force Strike: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Dart: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
